title: "'Robot scientist' Eve finds that less than one third of scientific results are reproducible"
excerpt: "Researchers have used a combination of automated text analysis and the 'robot scientist' Eve to semi-automate the process of reproducing research results. The problem of lack of reproducibility is one of the biggest crises facing modern science."
